page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT SURVEY-GOYTRE
page.content: The main centres of employment of full time workers in the village at the time of the survey were: Pontypool(19%),Cwmbran(16%), Mamhilad(10%) and Newport(9%). The village is well located in relation to these centres with links via the {A4042}trunk road between Abergavenny and Newport.In particular, the construction of the{New Inn} By-Pass,completed in 1982,has improved the journey to work for residents working in Pontypool,Newport and Cwmbran. It was found that {76%}of the workforce travelled by car and only{6% travelled to work by bus,mainly to Pontypool and Mamhilad.{13%}of the workforce had jobs in and around the village itself.Figures released in 1979 revealed no serious unemployment problems.
